bagItemsSentLetter.Lucikiel: Yo {0},^^You're making me do a lot of work. It's typical you would forget your own things. I don't want your junk, so I packed it up and sent it back to you.^Next time you leave things with me, they're going straight to the trash. But knowing Clint, he would probably dig through the bin and send it back to you. I give up...^^    - {1}
